title: You are completely fine
contents:
Until you realized you are not

I am Miss Eleanor Oliphant,  I have scars on me.  I am not beautiful.  I am plain.  I am poor.  I am not sociable.   People see me as a freak.  I have a very sad soul.

But I realized I am not fine, so maybe, just maybe, I will realize the beauty in my life.   My life can be beautiful when I realized I am not fine.
